checked.description: If true, a left check mark will be rendered.

classes.description: If true, the menu item will be disabled.

disabled.description: If true, the menu item will be disabled.

isAddedDrawer.description:
Callback function fired when the menu item is touch-tapped.

@param {object} event TouchTap event targeting the menu item.

leftIcon.description: The `SvgIcon` or `FontIcon` to be displayed on the left side.

leftIconStyle.description: The `SvgIcon` or `FontIcon` to be displayed on the right side.

onTouchTap.description:
Callback function fired when the menu item is touch-tapped.

@param {object} event TouchTap event targeting the menu item.

primaryText.description: Can be used to render primary text within the menu item.

rightIconStyle.description: The value of the menu item.

secondaryText.description: Can be used to render secondary text within the menu item.

style.description: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

value.description: The value of the menu item.
